alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 04 at 4:22AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch, mainly south of Evergreen. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely be slick and hazardous, mainly in areas south of Evergreen. Conditions will improve by mid morning.
info.instruction: Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
